segments.text: the camera angle switched to inside
turned around and opened the door,

critique: 1. There are grammatical issues, and it shouldn’t be described as “the camera angle switches to inside.” It should be revised as follows: The video begins with the camera positioned inside the car, remaining still in a close-up shot that focuses on the man in the driver’s seat looking toward the right side of the frame. Then, the camera perspective switches to what appears to be the interior of a hospital, where a woman uses her ID card to unlock the door, pulls it open, and walks forward.
